Manual

The sleuth package consists of the commands listed below. Click to see the help or type help(package="sleuth") in R.

basic_filter

get_col

models

factors

plot_bootstrap

plot_ma

plot_mean_var

plot_pca

plot_scatter

plot_vars

sleuth_model

read_kallisto

sleuth_fit

sleuth_interact

sleuth_prep

sleuth_results

sleuth_test

sleuth_to_matrix
